title: Add contact phone number to ContactSection

requirements.text: In the ContactSection component, update the displayed phone number to '7006981592' (formatted as +91 70069 81592 or similar Indian mobile format). Replace any existing placeholder phone number with this real contact number.
acceptanceCriteria: The ContactSection displays the phone number 7006981592
The number is formatted in a standard Indian mobile format (e.g., +91 70069 81592)
The phone number replaces any previously displayed placeholder phone number
The phone detail entry retains the same visual style as other contact details

constraints: Do not change any other contact details (address, email, form fields)
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Adding a clickable tel: link unless it fits the existing design pattern
Changing any other section of the site
Adding shopping cart or e-commerce functionality
